meanings.definition: The act of making someone a martyr.
meanings.sent1: The martyrization of the hero inspired many.
meanings.sent2: The martyrization of the saint was celebrated by the community.
meanings.sent3: The play depicted the martyrization of the character in a moving way.
meanings.sent4: Her martyrization in the war made her a symbol of bravery.
meanings.sent5: The martyrization of the leader will be remembered for generations.

meanings.definition: The process of turning someone into a martyr.
meanings.sent1: The slow martyrization of the rebel leader was evident to all.
meanings.sent2: The sudden martyrization of the activist shocked the nation.
meanings.sent3: The comedian joked about the martyrization of a clumsy character.
meanings.sent4: The martyrization of the cause transformed the movement.
meanings.sent5: The martyrization of the martyr was a powerful moment in history.

meanings.sent1: The martyrization of the prisoner was a tragic event.
meanings.sent2: The martyrization of the innocent victims touched everyone's hearts.
meanings.sent3: The cartoon showed the martyrization of a cartoon character in a funny way.
meanings.sent4: The martyrization of the soldier was a reminder of the cost of war.
meanings.sent5: The martyrization of the martyr brought tears to the eyes of the onlookers.
